tweets.text:
#ECOFIN is about to start! Check out today's heavy agenda 👇

Find out more: https://t.co/3wfSeHErfU
Follow ministers' arrivals LIVE: https://t.co/Uf6M1pAv7v

Financial supervision: @EUCouncil adopts revised frameworks for @EBA_News, @ESMAComms, @eiopa_europa_eu and #ESRB. 

Check the press release: https://t.co/ADGIBIapAA

🎙️ Soon, ESMA Chair Steven Maijoor will deliver a keynote speech @EFAMANews Investment Management Forum, in Brussels.

ℹ️👉 Check out the full agenda here: https://t.co/69s9QYtftc https://t.co/EGt2zPgY9I

On the 3 of December we will discuss the equivalence regime after #Brexit with:

🗣️A. Rubin de Cervin - @EU_Finance 
🗣️N. Moloney - @LSELaw 
🗣️@michalik_jak - @ESMAComms 
🗣️M. Graulich - @EurexGroup 
🗣️J. Jardelot - @LSEGplc 
🗣️@PabloPortugal4 - @AFME_EU 

https://t.co/jJpSa2emOr https://t.co/PDj4VE0mKQ

.@VDombrovskis hosting a luncheon for the Members and Observers of @EU_Commission’s Technical Expert Group on #SustainableFinanceEU, as an appreciation of their phenomenal work so far: “The #TEG has been a testament of what a strong private-public partnership can achieve.” https://t.co/ws8UfZ6BgR

Fruitful meeting with Mr Maijoor, Chair of @ESMAComms on the priorities of the @vonderleyen Commission including Capital Markets Union,  #sustainablefinanceEU and #fintech. Looking forward to continue working together on these important priorities! https://t.co/tjBFwN3VR6
Now another packed @bloomberg event in Brussels with @VDombrovskis and Steven Maijoor from @ESMAComms and Bloomberg’s own Mary Schapiro https://t.co/VhoMHdhR54
European Securities and Markets Authority and ASIC to co-operate on benchmarks https://t.co/6X6B1da2fJ

The fourth EU-Asia Pacific Forum on Financial Regulation was held this week in Tokyo to enhance cross-border cooperation between the 2 regions. Key issues included #SustainableFinanceEU, unintended market fragmentation, #Fintech and crypto-assets.  
📃 https://t.co/N4pZhx4MtM https://t.co/aMcaPWZfXv

#WARNING: De FSMA waarschuwt het publiek voor de activiteiten van Kuvera, die op onregelmatige wijze beleggingsdiensten aanbiedt in België #aanbieding #spaardiensten #vermogensbeheer #rendement https://t.co/3C3MMR10em https://t.co/JajNnnrCZW

#WARNING: La FSMA met le public en garde contre les activités de Kuvera, qui propose irrégulièrement des services d’investissement en Belgique. #offre #dépargne #gestiondepatrimoine #rendement https://t.co/iUkhS3BuX6 https://t.co/tm9IuznbPx

The euro short-term rate (€STR), a new benchmark interest rate, has been published for the first time. The rate reflects the wholesale euro unsecured overnight borrowing costs of banks located in the euro area. The €STR is available here https://t.co/BUp2OidOjS #EuroSTR https://t.co/b14OFa6YHP

🔹A European Green Deal 
🔹An economy that works for people 
🔹A Europe fit for the digital age 
🔹Protecting our European way of life
🔹A stronger Europe in the world

Good meeting with @BrunoLeMaire, FM of #France. Agreed: priorities of today cannot be postponed to tomorrow. It’s urgent to be more ambitious on #deepeningEMU, to set up a genuine Capital Markets Union & to seal a deal on taxonomy for #sustainablefinanceEU  #ClimateEmergency https://t.co/7FYtmmoOQV

We have taken stock of the EU’s #Brexit preparedness and contingency measures ahead of the June European Council.
We have concluded that there is no need to amend any measures on substance and that they remain fit for purpose.
Learn more → https://t.co/oM8a7dmB0C #Prepare4Brexit https://t.co/XnUnoLsp5A
